- Allow relation fields in Aggregate operation field selection
- Remove isFieldRelation filter from available fields
- Keep isSystem filter to prevent system fields from being shown

buildGroupByFieldObject utility, which converts field.name to field.nameId
for relations.

Note: Charts will display relation IDs (UUIDs) rather than human-readable
labels. Future enhancement needed to resolve label identifiers for better UX.
